Apply a sketch scale of 0.427 to the sketch. Part 2: Cylindrical Object with Flat Top Construct a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with an euler angle of [180, 0, -90] and a translation vector of [0.6936, 0.1516, 0]. Apply a sketch scale of 0.1188 to the sketch. The final model is a rectangular prism with a curved top and a flat bottom. The prism has a cylindrical base and a flat top with a notch cut out of it. The prism is centered on the white background. The dimensions of the parts are as follows: Part 1: * length: 0.427 * width: 0.427 * height: 0.1132 Part 2: * length: 0.1188 * width: 0.1859 * height: 0.1188</description>
